Some declarations are strong enough that the words themselves burn. This version of Cartier's original Déclaration takes on a deliberately torrid sensuality. description: A woody and floral fragrance, Gucci Bamboo Eau de Parfum is soft and intense at once, blooming with notes of exotic Casablanca Lily and Tahitian Vanilla. Sandalwood and Grey Amber balance the fragrance’s femininity with a resonating woody contrast.
title: Gucci Bamboo C

description: The lovers' passion is encapsulated in Gucci Guilty Black Pour Homme. They bring out the most scandalous sides of each other: alone they are magnificent, together irrepressible. Fearless in their passion, they are brazen, shameless, unpredictableready for each and every explosive encounter. Their attraction is instinctive: they go where they sense danger and each other.Too much is never enough for our young hedonists, who drive each other to stray ever darker. Life is thrilling and meant to be lived to the fullest. Again and again, they give in to pleasure and the excitement of breaking the rules.Gucci Guilty Black Pour Homme is a daring aromatique fougere, inviting you to indulge in your deepest desires.
title: Gucci Black Pour Homme T

description: Gucci Perfume by Gucci, Splash on a dab of classic gucci for a scent of sophisticated style that lasts all day long . This delightful women`s fragrance features rich base notes of heliotrope and orange blossom combined with exciting top notes of orris, vanilla and citrus.
title: Gucci By Gucci

description: Flora by Gucci Eau de Parfum is characterized by fresh notes of agrums in the opening, combined with beautiful peony. A heart introduces balanced aromas of rose and osmanthus, while a base is created of patchouli and sandalwood.

description: Created for the libertine who is completely free, this rich, noble fragrance unfolds with a citrus mandora top notesmoothed out by natural bergamot and pink pepper. The scent‘s complex lilac heart contrasts with rose, violet, and geranium for a nuanced, rare floral blend defined by a deep duet of natural patchouli oils.
title: Gucci Guilty C

description: Gucci Rush Perfume by Gucci, Launched by the design house of gucci in 1999, gucci rush is classified as a sharp, oriental, woody fragrance . This feminine scent possesses a blend of floral gardenia, coriander seeds, jasmine, rose, and vanilla. It is recommended for casual wear.

description: Champs Elysees Eau de Parfum by Guerlain is a floral fruity fragrance for women. It traces the historical journey of the Guerlain on its beautifully designed bottle. Floral and woody scents are beautifully blended. Top notes are floral; black currant, melon, almond, violet, peach and anise.
title: Guerlain Champs El Ysees

description: A tribute to Guerlain's passion for the dressage of horses, this dynamic eau de parfum creates an element of surprise by contrasting sweet and bold vanilla with woody and leather notes. It's a dynamic and audacious fragrance that blossoms with a spicy heart, nuanced with neroli and jasmine. An elegant and classic choice for any scent wardrobe.
title: Guerlain Habit Rouge

description: Mahora Eau de Parfum Guerlain for women features orange blossom, almond blossom, and green accords in the top, ylang-ylang, neroli, tuberose and jasmine in the heart, and sandalwood, vanilla and vetiver in the base.

description: A rose diffracted into a scent of phenomenal power. An olfactory explosion with an intense emotional charge. An exhilaration of pure energy, climaxing into intoxication.

description: Particularly textured, the natural essence of Oud wood is boldly adorned with the striking freshness of lavender, followed by a spicier facet with nutmeg and the power of saffron. A most astonishing olfactory journey, sublimated by an enveloping base of musk and patchouli.
title: Initio Oud For Greatness

description: The softness of Vanilla intimately intertwined with the animal potency of Musk and Castoreum. A powerful fragrance that obsessively reminds you of the other. A truly aphrodisiac essence.
title: Initio Parfums Prives Absolute

description: Rehab promises an ecstatic return to the pleasure of perfume. The harmony of its natural raw materials is revealed by a skilful combination of Bergamot, natural Lavender, Black Pepper and various Spices.
title: Initio Prives Rehab

description: The Tobacco, Vanilla, Rum and Cinnamon harmony of this fragrance is spell binding. It tantalises the most discerning senses by playing off each of its facets - Leather, animal and the woody note of Vanilla - one by one. Recklessly bold... and stirring. Deeply buried emotions and passions take over.
title: Initio Side Effect

description: L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Eau de Toilette is a woody aquatic fragrance with fresh and sparkling yuzu as in top notes, along with notes of lemon and tangerine. At the heart, the water lily note gives an aquatic facet, subtly warmed by spicy notes.
title: Issey Miyake Pour Homme

description: L'Eau Bleue d'Issey Pour Homme de Issey Miyake est un parfum Boisé Aromatique pour homme. L'Eau Bleue d'Issey Pour Homme a été lancé en 2004. Le nez derrière ce parfum est Jacques Cavallier. Les notes de tête sont Romarin, Citron vert, Bois d'oranger, Mandarine et Citronnelle; les notes de coeur sont Cyprès, Baies de genévrier, Gingembre, Lavande, Poivre rose, Badiane de Chine, Rose de Mai et Capucine; les notes de fond sont Cèdre Atlas, Patchouli, Mousse de chêne, Bois de santal, Ambre et Ambrette. Ce parfum est le gagnant du prix FiFi Award Best Packaging Men`s Prestige 2005.
title: Issey Miyake L'EAU Bleue Pour Homme

description: La feuille de framboise ultra croquante amène une nouvelle vibration. Duo addictif et déroutant, tandem givré et enjôleur, illuminé par la sensualité éclatante des pétales de magnolia. Un floral frais, insolite et rayonnant.

description: L'Eau Kenzo pour Femme is an aquatic, fruity, floral Eau de Toilette signed by Olivier Cresp: a Lotus flower caressed by a frosty breeze and accompanied by juicy Peach notes. The L'Eau Kenzo bottle echoes one of the most vital elements in nature: water.
title: Kenzo Femme

description: Kenzo celebrates the timeless scent of its fragrance for women, L'Eau Kenzo, with a new design. The trail is unchanged: L’EAU KENZO is inspired by nature’s lush generosity and collects its scents on the way. Scents of flowers, fruits, freshness and happiness. L'Eau Kenzo pour Femme is an aquatic, fruity, floral Eau de Toilette signed by Olivier Cresp: a Lotus flower caressed by a frosty breeze and accompanied by juicy Peach notes. The L'Eau Kenzo bottle echoes one of the most vital elements in nature: water. Its distinctive vertical design pays tribute to the power of this incredible source of life.
title: Kenzo Leau Par Kendra T

description: This aromatic aquatic fragrance has a blend of spices, citrus, sea notes, juniper berries, peach, caraway, rosem, pine, woodsy notes, amber, musk, balsam fir, oakmoss, vetiver, and labdanum.

You can count on it to linger in the air and on the skin, allowing you to make a memorable impression wherever you go...
